Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic missed a game-tying 3-pointer at the buzzer
The Timberwolves surrendered a 10-0 run to close out the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Timberwolves traded Karl-Anthony Towns and brought in Julius Randle and Donte DiVincenzo
The Nuggets have struggled to recapture their on-court brilliance since their championship victory in 2023
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Porter Jr. acknowledged the possibility that the team could be broken up if they continue to struggle this year
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nikola Jokic's teammate made a comment about the Nuggets potentially being dismantled if the 2024 season proves to be unsuccessful
Others: Aaron Gordon led the Nuggets with 31 points and 11 rebounds
Anthony Edwards topped the Timberwolves with 29 points
Rudy Gobert recorded 17 points and 14 rebounds for the Timberwolves
Julius Randle chipped in with 23 points, seven assists and six rebounds for the Timberwolves
